response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this exceptional item to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its actual value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
